topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 : from Crypto.Util.number import *
 import os
 m = bytes_to_long(flag.encode())
 e = 127
 def enc():
 p = getPrime(512)
 q = getPrime(512)
 n = p*q
 c = pow(m, e, n)
 print(f"n: {n}")
 print(f"c: {c}")
 def main():
 while True:
 opt = int(input('input> '))
 if opt == 1:
 enc()
 main()
